dcterms:creator: R. Gross
I. Matthews
J. Cohn
T. Kanade
S. Baker
dcterms:description: The dataset contains images of 337 subjects, captured in indoor settings having variations with respect to pose, illumination, and expression. A frontal only subset of the dataset containing 50,248 images is used in the experiments.
dcterms:title: CMU Multi-PIE Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Zhang
L. Zhang
D. Zhang
L. Shen
dcterms:description: The PolyU NIR Face Dataset consists of 34,000 NIR spectrum face images of 335 subjects, having pose, illumination and distance variations.
dcterms:title: PolyU-NIR

dcterms:creator: M. Grgic
K. Delac
S. Grgic
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of visible and NIR images of 130 subjects captured over three distances. For each distance, one subject has five visible images and two NIR images captured in uncontrolled indoor environment.
dcterms:title: SCface Dataset
